tp.pr4.instructions

Class HelpInstruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr4.instructions.HelpInstruction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Instruction

    public class HelpInstruction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Instruction
    Shows the game help with all the instructions that the robot can execute. This instruction works if the user writes HELP or AYUDA

                  throws WrongInstructionFormatException
        Parses the String returning a HelpInstruction instance or throwing a WrongInstructionFormatException()
        Specified by:
        parse in interface Instruction
        Parameters:
        cad - Text String to parse

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws InstructionExecutionException
        Prints the help string of every instruction. It delegates to the Interpreter class.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface Instruction
        Throws:
        InstructionExecutionException - if there exist any execution error.
